properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 11 at 3:36AM EST until February 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm and
Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY
